verses.verse: Again <S%H7725><s%> I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H702><s%> four chariots <S%H4818><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> from between two <S%H8147><s%> mountains; <S%H2022><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were mountains <S%H2022><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>
In the first <S%H7223><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> were red <S%H122><s%> horses; <S%H5483><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> black <S%H7838><s%> horses; <S%H5483><s%>

in the third <S%H7992><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> horses; <S%H5483><s%> and in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> dappled <S%H1261><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> all of them powerful. <S%H554><s%>
Then I asked <S%H559><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, <S%H113><s%> "What are these, my lord?"

The angel <S%H4397><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H702><s%> "These are the four winds <S%H7307><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> which go forth <S%H3318><s%> from standing <S%H3320><s%> before the Lord <S%H113><s%> of all the earth. <S%H776><s%>

The one with the black <S%H7838><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> goes out <S%H3318><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> country; <S%H776><s%> and the white <S%H3836><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; <S%H1261><s%> and the dappled went forth <S%H3318><s%> toward the south <S%H8486><s%> country. <S%H776><s%>"

The strong <S%H554><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and sought <S%H1245><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> that they might walk back and forth <S%H1980><s%> through the earth: <S%H776><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Go <S%H3212><s%> around <S%H1980><s%> and through the earth! <S%H776><s%>" So they walked back and forth <S%H1980><s%> through the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Then he called <S%H2199><s%> to <S%H853><s%> me, <S%H1696><s%> and spoke to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> those who go <S%H3318><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> country <S%H776><s%> have quieted <S%H5117><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the north <S%H6828><s%> country. <S%H776><s%>"
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

"Take <S%H3947><s%> of them of the captivity, <S%H1473><s%> even of Heldai, <S%H2469><s%> of Tobijah, <S%H2900><s%> and of Jedaiah; <S%H3048><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> the same day, <S%H3117><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zephaniah, <S%H6846><s%> where they have come <S%H935><s%> from Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

Yes, <S%H3947><s%> take silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> crowns, <S%H5850><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> them on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehozadak, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest; <S%H3548><s%>

and speak <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "Behold, <S%H376><s%> the man whose name <S%H8034><s%> is the Branch: <S%H6780><s%> and he shall grow up <S%H6779><s%> out of his place; <S%H1129><s%> and he shall build the temple <S%H1964><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%>

even he shall build <S%H1129><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the glory, <S%H1935><s%> and shall sit <S%H3427><s%> and rule <S%H4910><s%> on his throne; <S%H3678><s%> and he shall be a priest <S%H3548><s%> on his throne; <S%H3678><s%> and the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> shall be between them both. <S%H8147><s%>

The crowns <S%H5850><s%> shall be to Helem, <S%H2494><s%> and to Tobijah, <S%H2900><s%> and to Jedaiah, <S%H3048><s%> and to Hen <S%H2581><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zephaniah, <S%H6846><s%> for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Those who are far off <S%H7350><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you. <S%H8085><s%> This will happen, if you will diligently obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>"'"
